Description: Located in Tysons Corner, Avalon Park Crest is a brand new Virginia apartment community situated in desirable Fairfax County. Avalon Park Crest offers spacious Tysons Corner apartments with luxurious features. Community amenities include a state-of-the-art fitness center, sparkling swimming pool, underground parking, and the ease of maintenance-free living. Nearby attractions include a Harris Teeter grocery store, Starbucks, the Tysons Galleria Shopping Mall and the Tysons Corner Center Mall. Add in convenient access to transportation via the Silver Line Metro stations, Dulles Toll Road, I-495 and nearby Dulles Airport.

Description: Set in the most exclusive Tysons Corner location, The Lofts at Park Crest features world-class apartment living adjacent to the area's most extraordinary shopping, dining and entertainment options. Now available for lease, these loft apartments are located within a pedestrian-friendly urban community with tree-filled spaces and resort-style amenities. This extraordinary community is served by a Starbucks coffee shop to help you start your day and a Harris Teeter market to nourish your love for cooking. The neighborhood grocery's flagship store will offer traditional goods as well as a tremendous selection of gourmet prepared foods, fresh meats and cheeses, and specialty wines from around the globe. The architectural design of the lofts was inspired by authentic urban neighborhoods such as Soho and Battery Park and offers an amazing array of unique designer finishes, including EcoFinishes, hardwood flooring, Wood-Model cabinetry, KitchenAid appliances, Grohe fixtures and Lualdiporte doors.

Description: Spread over 16 acres, Post Tysons Corner is a beautifully wooded community of courtyard and garden apartments. Post Tysons Corner is located in the heart of the Tysons Corner submarket of northern Virginia and offers convenient access to the Dulles Toll Road, U.S. 66 and I-495, and the Metro mass transit system. Residents of Post Tysons Corner enjoy an impressive array of community amenities, including a resort-style pool, four tennis courts, a full-length basketball court, and a beautifully landscaped courtyard complete with ornate fountains and grilling area.

Our premier location is just minutes to the upscale shopping and dining at Tysons Galleria as well as National and Dulles Airports and the Dulles Toll Road, providing easy access to DC and Reston. Description:
THIS IS A CONDO SHARE! Large private master bedroom with adjoining bathroom available in second floor unit to share with young (30ish), responsible male professional in exclusive condo community with all the amenities. Renovated this summer with tons of upgrades! 
*Living room balcony overlooks picnic area and woods. 
*High ceilings, crown molding, cozy fireplace. New hardwood and porcelain tiles throughout. 
*Floor plan completely separates bedrooms each w/private bathroom on opposite sides of unit for maximum privacy. 
*Available fully furnished bedroom suite has remodeled bathroom, large walk in closet, ceiling fan and big bright window for lots of natural light. 
*Kitchen--stainless steel appliances, maple cabinets, granite countertops. 
*Full size washer/dryer in unit
*Gated community has 24-hour security. Amenities include: elevators, fitness center, theatre, sauna, business center, coffee bar and beautiful pool and sundeck. 
*Best part is location! Located at the Gates of McLean community which is not only steps away from the McLean Silver Line Metro Station, but also has direct access to I-495, I-66, Dulles Toll Road, and Rt. 123. Additionally, it is located across the street from Capital One, only five minutes from Tysons Corner and less than 10 minutes away from Price Waterhouse Cooper, Deloitte, Capital One, KPMG and more. 20 minutes away from DC, Dulles Airport, and Ballston. The neighborhood is gated and in a very safe area. 
*Condo fees, water and reserved exterior parking spot included in $1,390 rent. Internet, gas and electric split. Available November 17th. This will go FAST so please call or text 703-371-5560!

Pet Policy: Dogs Allowed

Description:
This Beautiful End-Unit Townhome has it all!
Wonderful architecture & design creates a warm, inviting, spacious & gracious home for all. 
Almost floor to ceiling windows allow for tons of natural light.
The open floorplan is outstanding for gatherings and entertaining yet still offers many nooks for more intimate spaces.
The end unit location provides opportunity for windows on 3 sides of the home. This one lives and feels like a home - not a townhome!
The main level offers gleaming wood floors throughout the living room, dining room, kitchen, breakfast room, and FP nook.
The next level boasts a beautiful master suite complete with office/den/sitting room, sumptuous bathroom, and his hers walk-in closets.
The top level sports 2 nice size bedrooms and bathroom.
The lower level is perfect for that game room, media room, play space, workout area - whatever your imagination can conceive.
Ideally located less than a mile to McLean metro, close to all major commuter routes, a stones throw from thriving and growing Tyson's Corner with its world class stores and restaurants, yet tucked deep into the Hunting Ridge community where privacy and quiet reigns.
Freshly painted and spruced up, this beautiful townhome is ready to be lived in and loved!
Pets considered on a case by case basis. 
Long term leases welcome!
Available TODAY!
Please call or email for any questions or to schedule a time to tour your next home!

Description:
(571) 502-3070 - Best Value in McLean--Spacious garden condo in McLean HS Pyramid - Large, all-neutral ground-floor unit in popular garden condo complex across from the new Anderson Road Safeway and close to site of coming Metro! Kitchen updated in 2009 with ceramic tile floor * Full-size side-by-side washer and dryer * Back door opens to grassy common area * Tenant pays electricty. Water, sewer, trash collection, and parking are included * Community pool and tot lot. Pets case by case, no dogs.
Qualifications: 2 years of full-time employment history, 2 years of rental history (or home ownership), good credit, qualifying income of at least $86,000 (for groups sharing, that would be the sum of the 2 lowest incomes).

Description:
(917) 865-0461 - Beautiful corner apartment (Apex model) with stunning west-facing views, spectacular sunset viewing everyday! Spacious & bright with walls of glass in the living room. Gleaming cherry hardwood floors, elegant tiled baths. Washer and dryer in apartment. Gourmet kitchen, dark cherry cabinets, granite counters, Stainless steel appliances, gas cooking! Comes with one dedicated parking space; a second one can be rented. Walk to 24 hour Harris Teeter, Starbucks, Tysons Galleria & Tysons Corner Metro! FABULOUS 18th floor Sky Bar & Roof Top pool, 24 hour concierge, gym, library and all the other luxuries of a high-end high-rise building. Zoned in prestigious Spring Hill-Longfellow-McLean pyramid, including the best elementary school in Fairfax county. Spring Hill school and Rec Center 5 minute drive away. Centrally located, less than 5 minutes from all major highways (267, 66, 495). 18 minutes from Dulles and 20 minutes from Reagan airport. What else might one want... Description:
(703) 893-6440 - Colonial Jr. 2bdrm/1bath Upgraded - This Upgraded Colonial Junior 2bedroom/1bathroom is 950 sq ft and features a square kitchen with a small breakfast bar, unique rounded balconies with french doors, and the washer/dryer in the kitchen. This unit also offers the benefits of a private entrance.
About Dolley Madison Apartments
This community is located in the heart of a thriving technology corridor as well as one of the most successful communities in the state, but you would never know it when you are looking at the rolling hills and parks that surround this classic apartment community in McLean. Despite the peaceful surroundings, you are only moments away from all of the conveniences that make this area so desirable. The community has all of your fitness goals and favorite activities covered. There are 3 different types of sport courts, four separate play areas and an Olympic sized pool. Dolley Madison is everything you are looking for in an apartment and more.
$1000 off the first month's rent special ends 10/10/17
